description: A login page component using React, with focus management and basic form handling. It includes focusable inputs and a button, with no backend integration.

methods.name: Login
methods.description: React functional component rendering a login form with focus management.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, currently shows an alert as a placeholder.

methods.name: onKeyDown
methods.description: Handles key down events to trigger login button click on Enter key.
